price: 67. Waxaan markaas ka siin laheyn Xaggayaga Ajar Weyn.
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
